verbose_text: XREF_BIBR Unfolded VWF can bind to subendothelial collagen (via A1 and A3 domains) XREF_BIBR and interact with platelets through GPIbalpha XREF_BIBR which slows down the platelets through GPIIb / IIIa resulting in platelet activation, shape change, expression of activated integrins, and secretion of autocrine agents present on platelets.
